front.title: A Profile for Endpoint Identifier Origin Authorizations (IOA)

abstract.t: This document defines a standard profile for End-Point Identifiers Origin Authorizations (IOAs). An IOA is a digitally signed object that provides a means of verifying that the EID IP address block holder has authorized a set of Router Locators (RLOCs) as its de- encapsulation point in a Map & Encap mapping service.
